page.title: 10RAGLAN COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: {RAGLAN COMMUNITY CENTRE} Raglan Community Centre incorporates the Junior School and Old church hall. There is a Playgroup for children 2-4yrs and a Mothers and Todlers group.Children's gymnastics are on Monday,Guides & Brownies Mon. & Tues. Children's Disco & Old Time classes are held on Saturdays.Adult Badminton is on Tues.& Frid.,carpet bowls Tues. Thurs.& Frid. Yogo on Mon. and Bingo on Wednesdays.A group of Senior Citizens meet three mornings a week to play cards.Whist Drives are held fortnightly.The centre is hired for parties,discos,coffee mornings & fetes.Facilities for the disabled are sloped ramps,toilets and doors.Adult evening classes are also held.A licensed bar is allowed for some functions.Caretakers look after the centre.
